channel.title: Compiler help?
channel.description: Hi, my compiler gets no errors when I compile, but doesn't save. Here's the compiler. [code=text]@echo off title Compiling... "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_05\bin\javac.exe" -classpath deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/jython.jar;deps/xstream.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/poi.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar -d bin src\server\event\*.java src\server\model\items\*.java src\server\model\minigames\*.java src\server\model\npcs\*.java src\server\model\objects\*.java src\server\model\players\*.java src\server\model\players\skills\*.java src\server\model\players\packets\*.java src\server\model\shops\*.java src\server\net\*.java src\server\task\*.java src\server\util\*.java src\server\world\*.java src\server\util\log\*.java src\server\*.java src\server\world\map\*.java pause[/code]

item.title: Compiler help?
item.dc:creator: @Yambar Yambar
item.description:
@Yambar wrote:

[quote=“RandQm, post:6, topic:466596”][quote author=Yambar link=topic=583170.msg4153737#msg4153737 date=1352576026]

None of the code I do saves after compiling.

A compiler isn’t meant to save your code but to convert it.
You have to save your code by saving the file…

Obiviously you save the file, It doesn’t convert is what I’m trying to say.
[/quote]
An error can cause this, so since it doesn’t show one I’d recommend importing into an IDE like Eclipse and hope that this will clarify[/quote]

Alright, I’ll try it.

Read full topic

item.title: Compiler help?
item.dc:creator: @RandQm RandQm
item.description:
@RandQm wrote:

[quote=“Yambar, post:5, topic:466596”][quote author=RandQm link=topic=583170.msg4153731#msg4153731 date=1352575926]

None of the code I do saves after compiling.

A compiler isn’t meant to save your code but to convert it.
You have to save your code by saving the file…
[/quote]

Obiviously you save the file, It doesn’t convert is what I’m trying to say.[/quote]
An error can cause this, so since it doesn’t show one I’d recommend importing into an IDE like Eclipse and hope that this will clarify

Read full topic

item.title: Compiler help?
item.dc:creator: @Yambar Yambar
item.description:
@Yambar wrote:

Hi, my compiler gets no errors when I compile, but doesn’t save. Here’s the compiler.

@echo off title Compiling... "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_05\bin\javac.exe" -classpath deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/jython.jar;deps/xstream.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/poi.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar -d bin src\server\event\*.java src\server\model\items\*.java src\server\model\minigames\*.java src\server\model\npcs\*.java src\server\model\objects\*.java src\server\model\players\*.java src\server\model\players\skills\*.java src\server\model\players\packets\*.java src\server\model\shops\*.java src\server\net\*.java src\server\task\*.java src\server\util\*.java src\server\world\*.java src\server\util\log\*.java src\server\*.java src\server\world\map\*.java pause

Read full topic
